name: notes-model
description: ``` As a programmer So I can find the note I want I can see my list of notes, with each abbreviated to the first 20 characters ``` ``` As a programmer So I can record something I need to remember I can create a new note ``` ``` As a programmer So I can see all the information in the note I can see the full text of an individual note on its own page ``` # Challenges **NB** "Spike" means writing code without writing tests. "TDD" means develop test first.
